name: Orzo With Fresh Tomato
keywords: dairy-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, orzo, tomato, side dish
recipeIngredient: 3/4 pound ripe fresh tomatoes, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the water to a boil in a saucepan. Add salt.  Cook the orzo according to package directions. Drain.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a saucepan. Cook the onions until they are wilted. Add the tomatoes, sprinkle with salt and pepper and the pepper flakes. Stir gently and bring the pan juices to a boil.
Add the orzo and stir gently to blend.
